mapper.select: SELECT TSGROUP.purchase_date, CUSTOMER_INFO.customer_id, tsgroup.sum TSG, fsgroup.sum FSG, SUM(tsgroup.sum + fsgroup.sum) SUM FROM CUSTOMER_INFO JOIN TSGROUP ON (customer_info.CUSTOMER_ID = TSGROUP.CUSTOMER_ID) JOIN FSGROUP ON (customer_info.customer_id = FSGROUP.ticket_pub_code) WHERE TSGROUP.PURCHASE_DATE = #{PURCHASE_DATE} group by TSGROUP.purchase_date, customer_info.customer_id, tsgroup.sum, fsgroup.sum
